text: == Events == * Peter (Byzantine General) wins the battle against the Eurasian Avars * Liuva II replaces his brother Reccared as King of the Visigoths. * The Qieyun, a Chinese character rhyme dictionary, is published * The future Archbishops of Canterbury, Mellitus, Justus, and Honorius, and the future Archbishop of York Paulinus, are sent to England by Pope Gregory I to help Augustine in his missionary work. == Births == * Sigebert II of Austrasia and Burgundy * Hongren, a Zen Buddhist patriarch of the Chinese Tang Dynasty (d. 674) * Ma Zhou, Chinese chancellor of the Tang Dynasty (d. 648) * Empress Zhangsun == Deaths == * Saint David, Patron Saint of Wales * Reccared, King of the Visigoths
